treatment-md.title: Esthemopsis pallida Dias, Dolibaina, Mielke & Casagrande, 2014, stat. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: Two new species of Esthemopsis C. Felder & R. Felder, 1865 (Lepidoptera: Riodinidae: Symmachiini) from southeastern and northeastern Brazil, with taxonomic comments on Esthemopsis teras (Stichel, 1910) stat. rev. and Esthemopsis pallida Lathy, 1932 stat. nov.
